This Implementation Guide contains the full set of specifications for general case reporting workflows. It has been developed to support case reporting as part of the public health response use case.
This Implementation Guide is intended to be supplemented by one or more content guides developed for specific health program areas which will define the details of the case report. Examples of such content guides include:
HIV
Covid-19
This Implementation Guide defines three actors involved in the submission of a case report into a case report repository. These actors engage in the transactions to submit, transform and store case reports into a case report repository.
{% include actors_transactions.svg %} Actors and Transactions
This implementation guide is accomponied with an Instant OpenHIE technical specification.
